verses.verse: Joshua <WH3091> gathered <WH622> all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to Shechem, <WH7927> and called <WH7121> for the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> for their heads, <WH7218> for their judges, <WH8199> and for their officers; <WH7860> and they presented <WH3320> themselves before <WH6440> God. <WH430>

Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to all the people, <WH5971> "Thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> <WH1> 'Your fathers lived <WH3427> of old time <WH5769> beyond <WH5676> the River, <WH5104> even Terah, <WH8646> the father <WH1> of Abraham, <WH85> and the father <WH1> of Nahor: <WH5152> and they served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods. <WH430>

I took <WH3947> your father <WH1> Abraham <WH85> from beyond <WH5676> the River, <WH5104> and led <WH3212> him throughout all the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and multiplied <WH7235> his seed, <WH2233> and gave <WH5414> him Isaac. <WH3327>

I gave <WH5414> to Isaac <WH3327> Jacob <WH3290> and Esau: <WH6215> and I gave <WH5414> to Esau <WH6215> Mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> to possess <WH3423> it. <WH3290> Jacob and his children <WH1121> went down <WH3381> into Egypt. <WH4714>

<WH7971>"'I sent Moses <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> and I plagued <WH5062> Egypt, <WH4714> according to that which <WH834> I did <WH6213> in its midst: <WH7130> and afterward <WH310> I brought you out. <WH3318>

I brought <WH3318> your fathers <WH1> out of Egypt: <WH4714> and you came <WH935> to the sea. <WH3220> The Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> your fathers <WH1> with chariots <WH7393> and with horsemen <WH6571> to the Red <WH5488> Sea. <WH3220>

When they cried <WH6817> out to Yahweh, <WH3068> he put <WH7760> darkness <WH3990> between you and the Egyptians, <WH4713> and brought <WH935> the sea <WH3220> on them, <WH3680> and covered them; <WH5869> and your eyes saw <WH7200> what I did <WH6213> in Egypt: <WH4714> and you lived <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> many <WH7227> days. <WH3117>

<WH935>"'I brought you into the land <WH776> of the Amorites, <WH567> that lived <WH3427> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan: <WH3383> and they fought <WH3898> with you; <WH5414> and I gave them into your hand. <WH3027> You possessed <WH3423> their land; <WH776> and I destroyed <WH8045> them from before you. <WH6440>

Then Balak <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor, <WH6834> king <WH4428> of Moab, <WH4124> arose <WH6965> and fought <WH3898> against Israel. <WH3478> He sent <WH7971> and called <WH7121> Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> to curse you; <WH7043>
but I would <WH14> not listen <WH8085> to Balaam; <WH1109> therefore he blessed <WH1288> you still. <WH1288> So I delivered <WH5337> you out of his hand. <WH3027>

<WH5674>"'You went over the Jordan, <WH3383> and came <WH935> to Jericho. <WH3405> The men <WH1167> of Jericho <WH3405> fought <WH3898> against you, <WH567> the Amorite, the Perizzite, <WH6522> the Canaanite, <WH3669> the Hittite, <WH2850> the Girgashite, <WH1622> the Hivite, <WH2340> and the Jebusite; <WH2983> and I delivered <WH5414> them into your hand. <WH3027>

I sent <WH7971> the hornet <WH6880> before <WH6440> you, <WH1644> which drove them out from before <WH6440> you, <WH8147> even the two kings <WH4428> of the Amorites; <WH567> not with your sword, <WH2719> nor with your bow. <WH7198>

I gave <WH5414> you a land <WH776> whereon you had not labored, <WH3021> and cities <WH5892> which you didn't <WH1129> build, and you live <WH3427> in them. <WH398> You eat of vineyards <WH3754> and olive <WH2132> groves which you didn't <WH5193> plant.'

"Now therefore fear <WH3372> Yahweh, <WH3068> and serve <WH5647> him in sincerity <WH8549> and in truth. <WH571> Put away <WH5493> the gods <WH430> which your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> beyond <WH5676> the River, <WH5104> in Egypt; <WH4714> and serve <WH5647> Yahweh. <WH3068>

If it seems evil <WH7489> to you <WH4310> to serve <WH5647> Yahweh, <WH3068> choose <WH977> this day <WH3117> whom <WH5869> you will serve; <WH5647> whether the gods <WH430> which your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> that were beyond <WH5676> the River, <WH5104> or the gods <WH430> of the Amorites, <WH567> in whose land <WH776> you dwell: <WH3427> but as for me and my house, <WH1004> we will serve <WH5647> Yahweh. <WH3068>"
The people <WH5971> answered, <WH6030> <WH559> "Far <WH2486> be it from us that we should forsake <WH5800> Yahweh, <WH3068> to serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods; <WH430>

for it is Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> who brought us and our fathers <WH1> up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the house <WH1004> of bondage, <WH5650> and who did <WH6213> those great <WH1419> signs <WH226> in our sight, <WH5869> and preserved <WH8104> us in all the way <WH1870> in which we went, <WH1980> and among all the peoples <WH5971> through <WH7130> the midst of whom we passed. <WH5674>

Yahweh <WH3068> drove out <WH1644> from before <WH6440> us all the peoples, <WH5971> even the Amorites <WH567> who lived <WH3427> in the land. <WH776> Therefore we also will serve <WH5647> Yahweh; <WH3068> for he is our God. <WH430>"

Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> "You can't <WH3201> serve <WH5647> Yahweh; <WH3068> for he is a holy <WH6918> God. <WH430> He is a jealous <WH7072> God. <WH430> He will not forgive <WH5375> your disobedience <WH6588> nor your sins. <WH2403>

If you forsake <WH5800> Yahweh, <WH3068> and serve <WH5647> foreign <WH5236> gods, <WH430> then he will turn <WH7725> and do you evil, <WH7489> and consume <WH3615> you, <WH310> after he has done you good. <WH3190>"
The people <WH5971> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "No; <WH5647> but we will serve Yahweh. <WH3068>"

Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> "You are witnesses <WH5707> against yourselves that you have chosen <WH977> Yahweh <WH3068> yourselves, <WH5647> to serve him. <WH559>" They said, "We are witnesses. <WH5707>"
"Now therefore put away <WH5493> the foreign <WH5236> gods <WH430> which are among <WH7130> you, <WH5186> and incline your heart <WH3824> to Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>"
The people <WH5971> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "We will serve <WH5647> Yahweh <WH3068> our God, <WH430> and we will listen <WH8085> to his voice. <WH6963>"
So Joshua <WH3091> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with the people <WH5971> that day, <WH3117> and made <WH7760> for them a statute <WH2706> and an ordinance <WH4941> in Shechem. <WH7927>

Joshua <WH3091> wrote <WH3789> these words <WH1697> in the book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> of God; <WH430> and he took <WH3947> a great <WH1419> stone, <WH68> and set it up <WH6965> there under the oak <WH427> that was by the sanctuary <WH4720> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to all the people, <WH5971> "Behold, <WH68> this stone shall be a witness <WH5713> against us; <WH8085> for it has heard all the words <WH561> of Yahweh <WH3068> which he spoke <WH1696> to us. <WH5713> It shall be therefore a witness against you, <WH3584> lest you deny your God. <WH430>"
So Joshua <WH3091> sent the people <WH5971> away, <WH7971> every man <WH376> to his inheritance. <WH5159>

It happened after <WH310> these things, <WH1697> that Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh, <WH3068> died, <WH4191> being one hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old. <WH1121>

They buried <WH6912> him in the border <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnathserah, <WH8556> which is in the hill <WH2022> country of Ephraim, <WH669> on the north <WH6828> of the mountain <WH2022> of Gaash. <WH1608>

Israel <WH3478> served <WH5647> Yahweh <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of Joshua, <WH3091> and all the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> who outlived <WH3117> Joshua, <WH3091> and had known <WH3045> all the work <WH4639> of Yahweh, <WH3068> that he had worked <WH6213> for Israel. <WH3478>

They buried <WH6912> the bones <WH6106> of Joseph, <WH3130> which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> brought up <WH5927> out of Egypt, <WH4714> in Shechem, <WH7927> in the parcel <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> which Jacob <WH3290> bought <WH7069> of the sons <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem <WH7927> for a hundred <WH3967> pieces of money. <WH7192> They became the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Joseph. <WH3130>

Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> died. <WH4191> They buried <WH6912> him in the hill <WH1389> of Phinehas <WH6372> his son, <WH1121> which was given <WH5414> him in the hill <WH2022> country of Ephraim. <WH669>
